website_summaries.verdict: Positively packed with fun and educational features, this kiddies smartwatch offers unbeatable value for money.
pros: Teaches children to tell time in both analog and digital format
Comes with a variety of educational games, and more can be downloaded from the Learning Lodge app
Feature-rich design boasts a camera for pictures and videos, voice recorder with fun effects including calculator, calendar, and more
cons: Camera resolution isn't the best, but being a children's toy, this is forgivable

website_summaries.verdict: From a reputable manufacturer, this is a fun, basic smartwatch for the younger set.
pros: Includes camera for photos and videos, customizable face, and alarm/timer
Kids use it to play games, but this function can be turned off during school
cons: Older kids might be disappointed by the low resolution of the photos and the limited offerings as compared to more sophisticated tablets and laptops

customer_reviews.title: Barely 6 months old and it has completely stopped working ...
customer_reviews.text: Barely 6 months old and it has completely stopped working, contacted customer support for VTECH and they state it's inoperable and only has a 3 month warranty! Then tells me to use their partners to purchase another....REALLY!!???!?!?
customer_reviews.author: Ash11

customer_reviews.title: Great games that keep my kids moving.
customer_reviews.text: WHAT HAVE I DONE, I HAVE TURNED MY KIDS INTO ZOMBIES!!! They love this watch. Its fun, I have had to limit the amount of time they spend on them as they seem to zone the world out while playing on them. Regardless, it packs a lot of little features that kids really find fun. My favorite part and the kids are the fitness games on the watch. The little guys work so hard to achieve their goals. It will count your steps and activity during a game and tell you what kind of an animal you are like.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Prescott

customer_reviews.title: electrical BURNS to my kids wrist.. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: My kid got BURNS on his wrist where the battery goes!! VERY BAD! DO NOT BUY! DANGEROUS AND CHEAPLY MADE.. very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: One Love

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: My Son has had this for 4 months (Bought on Black Friday sale, not used until after Christmas). It seems to have fried when it was put on the charger. It smells burnt and has completely stopped working. I contacted customer support for VTECH and they tell me it only has a 3 month warranty! Then they tell me to use their partners to purchase another....Not happening! I'm very disappointed that such a great item comes with a crap warranty. I will be looking into other brands from now on, and advising my friends to look for something with a better warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Shai

customer_reviews.title: Watch Band Broke-Can not be replaced.  Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with watch band and VTech customer support. This watch did not even last 4 months. Watch band broke and I contacted VTech- they tell me the watch band can not be replaced and suggest I buy another watch. I have never heard of a watch that has a band that can not be replaced. I wasted $60.00 and have a disappointed son. I will never buy a VTech product again.
customer_reviews.author: Randi V.

customer_reviews.title: I charged for at least five hours, and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I charged for at least five hours, and the screen is still off. But, when I push the buttons and tap the screen, I can hear the sound. When I charge the watch, there is nothing displayed on the screen. What's wrong the this toy? I just it this afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubber USB protector
customer_reviews.text: The rubber usb protector came out of its attachment point the second day my son had it. I contacted customer support to see if they had instructions on how to reinstall this piece and this was the reply I got, "Thank you for contacting VTech Kids Customer Support. We're sorry to hear that the rubber that covers the USB port of your Smartwatch fell off. Regrettably, there's no way to reinstall the USB port cover. Regrettably, any accidental damage voids the warranty of the unit." I would avoid this watch if you are looking for something durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandonhyl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for boys!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson got this for xmas. He opened the package (by far the hardest operation) and started playing games and taking pictures before everyone else was finished opening. Of course he's a gifted child, everyone's grandchild is gifted so no worries there. I would say the watch is very intuitive for kids so they pick it up very quickly. Fortunately it came fully charged, and he wore it all day. He took surprisingly good pictures of everyone, and Granny is going to download some to save. Excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: bothernomr

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very weary of getting this even though my son really wanted it. I was afraid it would be complicated, break and malfunction easily and be too young for him since he has an iPad and a nintendo switch too (lucky kid, he has older siblings). Anyway, this is his favorite. He mostly uses the exercise app (which I love, he's running around the house like crazy) and the photo/video feature. He was using the calculator before school today too. He also likes a sound shaker game. We are very pleased. We've had it for only 1 week, I'll update if he loses interest fast or if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: joyslp

customer_reviews.title: it's early days I am a little biased they they will get bored with them because they have had their own iPads ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch might be a little basic for my 8 year old daughter she nailed all the features within one day! There was a very small amount of Adult Set-up required and guidance on charging and downloading pics. And they did not want to wear them at home this week. However, it's early days I am a little biased they they will get bored with them because they have had their own iPads with better camera, voice and games. since they were 5. They took them to school and it wen't well, and they knew not to use them during lessens. They also really really enjoyed them on the first few days!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brindley

customer_reviews.title: Cool Watch But Broke Easily and VTech Does Not Stand Behind Their Product
customer_reviews.text: Cool product but the band broke after maybe 20 uses and VTech's response is that 1) the band is not replaceable and 2) the warranty does not cover wear and tear. They advised me to buy another watch. There is absolutely no way I'm buying another one! It's too bad because my son really liked the watch but to label the breakage as wear and tear after that few uses and not to offer a replacement band is ridiculous. They've likely lost my business for good!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! The watch band isn’t replaceable.
customer_reviews.text: This watch lasted all of two weeks after we gave it to my son. I thought that Vtech makes kids toys and they last, so what could go wrong? Then the band ripped and I find out that you can’t replace the band. Also you can’t turn off the games, so the watch can’t be worn at school. Very disappointed in the quality and the thought that went into the watch. I would return it in a heartbeat if I could.
customer_reviews.author: underdogut

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for younger audiences
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of this watch is fantastic, and the screen is awesome. However, it failed to captivate my almost-seven-year-old son for more than 10 minutes. I would be floored if I could root this watch to install some other operating system on it. As it is, though, it probably won't keep any six-year-old occupied once he or she has had a taste of Android or iOS devices.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetry Guy

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 4 year old boy for Christmas. He didn't immediately play with it but now he loves it! He loves playing the games on it. He loves recording his voice on it and playing it back to us...lol. He loves making videos and taking pictures. It is like his "iphone/applewatch" and is age appropriate. We would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Broke afrer 6 months
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of light use the home button is sticking and activates all by itself. The warranty is only 3 months probably because this product is not expected to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: Great starter smart watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my almost 10 yr old. After reading reviews I was a bit skeptical that it was to young for my son. ...but he loves it. I'm sure after some time he will get bored with the games as they are just those silly games...like jump over the frog or tic tax toe. The camera works great for pics and videos, but you can't take selfies when watch is on the wrist
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product that doesn't last and horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars, I would. We bought one of these a year ago and it died on us but the Warranty had expired. So we got another one in November to give to our son for Christmas. Less than 6 months later, it died again. Both times, we reached out to vtech and they wouldn't do anything. Apparently, the Warranty is only 3 months. Cheap product that doesn't last and horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great starting point for a smart watch!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson, upon opening this package, OMG! OMG! This is what I wanted! He sat beside it for the almost 3 hours it took to charge & then played with it, incessantly! He is 5 years old & was finding it easy to utilize the watch. He took photos, recorded messages & played games. He is looking forward to getting new games after he plays through the 5 games on the watch. The color is vivid. The watch looks very adult.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Brown

customer_reviews.title: Does not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: I did some daily Christmas shopping and when we opened it today we can’t get past the time and date prompts. It’s extremely slow and does not respond. I am disappointed as this is a Vetec item and I thought more of the company’s products. Now we are outside the rerun window.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Broke after four months!!
customer_reviews.text: My son had this watch for 4 months when it suddenly stopped working properly. Certain games kept on freezing, and we would have to restart the phone. When I contacted the manufacturer, they said that there was nothing that they could do, and the watch could not be repaired. Apparently this watch only has a 3 month warranty which is absurd. Very disappointing, and I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ternum

customer_reviews.title: Its called a smartwatch but it doesn't keep time!
customer_reviews.text: So the pros: my daughter likes it. So that's why I gave it more than one star. It has some games, a camera etc and they all appear to function as designed. Cons: it's a watch that WILL NOT keep the correct time wth VTECH???!? This the 2nd one we received a d it has the same issue. She wants to keep it or I woukd have rma'd again
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Favourite gift of grandson for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson announced this was his most favourite gift this year! He used it for the games but also to keep track of his jumping and other physical activities.
customer_reviews.author: Miss ReadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: It's a great little watch with a lot of cool games
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears this watch more than my son. It's a great little watch with a lot of cool games. We were impressed with the camera capability. My 11 year old daughter has worn it as well. My son loves this! He asked for it for Christmas. The only negative which is not the watches fault is that he only wants to wear it for about 5 minutes at a time - then my husband has to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyBear

customer_reviews.title: (A really fun toy for 5 years old up to about 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for twin boys five years old. I spent two days trying to learn enough about this gift before giving it to the children in order to make sure that they could do at least a few functions when I gave them to them. In about five minutes they had mastered what little that I knew and a whole lot more. Within a half hour they totally 'owned' the items. (A really fun toy for 5 years old up to about 20 or wherever.)
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Fun watch for preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: We've had it for a month now and so far so good. My 5 year old seems to enjoy it, playing with it for a day or two and giving it a rest for a week. We like to use it for trips and for the sale price I got it on it was worth the price. Even the 18 month old can play with it and I don't have to worry about him messing anything up. It does the job as starter tech!
customer_reviews.author: Jess H.

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to pay $79 for a watch that might ...
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to pay $79 for a watch that might last 1 year. I bought two of these and one does not hold a charge any longer. I called the manufacturer and they only offer 3 month warranty and no replacement battery available.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! My boys are thrilled with their watches
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! My boys are thrilled with their watches. Their little faces lit up when they saw them. They call them their superhero watches. Good display, good games, camera and voice functions are a huge hit. A little bulky on their 6 year old wrists but any smaller and the display would be difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This little watch has been through many drops. It has been lost and forgotten about over the year and some since we purchased it. It still holds up. My son (now 8) enjoys it still. It’s a good beginner watch.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Nephew Loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew for Christmas, he's five. He lives the Camera and Video feature. Makes him feel like a big boy. You can also record people conversation, so watch what you say (lol). Quality is good, and kids love and Lear technology quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cynq1

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my 6 year old nephew. He received it on Christmas which was 3 days ago and the strap has already broke.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Great kids gift
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 and was so excited to receive this gift. He really likes to take pictures and there isn’t so much “stuff” on here that he is lost in it for hours. He plays a couple of short games then just enjoys it as it is for a watch.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJ

customer_reviews.title: Cute smart watch for kids
customer_reviews.text: Cute smart watch for kids , my son who is three kind of has it figured out I mean he knows how to play games but he does take pictures of random things . I'm sure with more use he'll learn everything just fine . It's great ! Keeps him busy for sure especially in the car .
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER RESISTANT
customer_reviews.text: I am contacting Vtech, My son wore this watch while playing in the snow and it got water damage!!! He was so careful, took it off even to wash dishes even though it said water resistant. I can't believe this product is marketed to children if it can't even handle a small amount of snow melt under a glove!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves thiswatch! He will eventually be able to tell time ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this watch! He will eventually be able to tell time but until then, he can play games and take pictures and that's amazing to him. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but could be more challenging and fun
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected ! Unfortunately my youngest son was not very interested ; not much to choose from on watch but it is durable and can assist with telling time. I just think he is more mature even at his age for this item
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Herrod

customer_reviews.title: ... hard to pull my 7 yo away from thiswatch. Plenty of fun to keep young kids entertained
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to pull my 7 yo away from this watch. Plenty of fun to keep young kids entertained. Tic Tac Toe, silly music and motion games, and a camera to take silly pictures. Did notice that it has difficulty detecting faces, but that hasn't dampened my daughter's fun too much. She likes, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old thought it was awesome. Apparently the future is now. He did tear the watch band after like 4 months. It was hard for him to put it on and take it off by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dick

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product, but I got it for my 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product, but I got it for my 4 1/2 yr old grandson, who has been using an iPad since he was a little over a year old. Also, can use a iPhone, Android and Kindle now. He had no interest in this at all. I think it was too small of face and too big for his wrist. Just didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this watch is great to make your child feel special and entertained plus it's interactive features are educational!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenlee

customer_reviews.title: I was not given this at any discount.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my six year grandson for Christmas. He loves it. His parents have not read the instructions yet, so he hasn't been able to use all of its functions. 😡 Still he can play some games, take pictures and record on it. I think this is a very nice item. He has not had any trouble with it.
customer_reviews.author: Grammygran

customer_reviews.title: Passable, but not for tech-savvy kids
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a hit, but it lost its appeal rather quickly. Short battery life and highly pixelated pictures meant my 5 year old wasn't as impressed as I thought he'd be, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson absolutely loved this watch but it stopped working after 4 months. He was so upset.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen D. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: My boys love their watches! Lots of fun things to do, with mini games, stop watch, camera could be better, but my boys enjoy their watches! Lots of clock faces. Watch can read out the time to your child so they can learn to read time.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Normand

customer_reviews.title: Age appropriate
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my just turned 5 yr old grandson for Christmas. He really liked it for the first hour then said he was bored. But after showing him a lot of what it could do, he really liked it. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: BEST GIFT EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have these for our boys and just got these for all the cousins! My son has worn his camo one he got from Santa last Christmas EVERY SINGLE DAY since he got it. Best gift he has ever gotten. Battery life is great! He even broke his arm severely bad and he was determined to still wear it on that arm...so he tied it off his sling. The little loop for the strap broke off 6 months in...but we just use a few black rubberbands (ponytail holder type) for that now and it blends in and looks fine. Honostly...the best gift he has ever gotten!
customer_reviews.author: CowboyCrew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We returned it. It was for smaller kids. Our nine year old was too mature for this.
customer_reviews.author: old coach

customer_reviews.title: awesome kid watch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch for kids. After a year still working like new. Kids love thwm
customer_reviews.author: Kreepindeath82

customer_reviews.title: Causes 3rd degree burns
customer_reviews.text: This watch gave my 7 year old 3 degree burns on his arm - only wore it day time - did not get it wet . Was sent to the school nurse as he felt burning one day and has blisters all over his hand where the back of the watch face was on his skin
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Very cool and lots of apps
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Very cool and lots of apps , storage and uses. My 4 year old has had no issue figuring it out which is even better. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail cable

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Our six year old son loved this watch, played with it a lot and took good care of it. One day, however, it would only allow you to enter the date and then shuts off. We tried everything to get it going again and nothing worked. Later, it started working again and our son was so excited to have his toy back! Shortly thereafter, it stopped working again and he was very sad. It is outside of warranty so I guess we are out of luck. Really great product while it works! If Vtech offers us a solution, will update review.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Jankovic

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a great Christmas price for my 4.5 year old son. It's a neat watch he really enjoys. He was thrilled to be able to take his own pictures. He doesn't wear it regularly, just pulls it out to play with it once in a while. Good purchase - recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren J.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Am really impressed with this company! Bought two of these for my two gransons and when the watch band on the more expensive one broke(the green camouflage band) the company quickly shipped another band at no cost! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for an 8 yr old boy and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Barmer

customer_reviews.title: Times up
customer_reviews.text: Was a big hit with my grandson, and even a bigger hit with the adults. It has several watch face options and other options that will keep him occupied for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this watch and it made the perfect gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: V tach watch for kids
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson just fell in love with his first watch
customer_reviews.author: Danny Martin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FOR 5 YEAR OLD LITTLE BOYS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas and he LOVES it! He wears it everyday, and loves playing the variety of games it has. It keeps him busy while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri M.

customer_reviews.title: Neat Kids' Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy for my 5 year old grandson, and he feels "important" when he wears it. There are quite a lot of functions for the price. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: sam8891

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch for my son as a Christmas gift and he absolutely loves it. Nice age-appropriate features and looks very nice on his arm.
customer_reviews.author: Shara S. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Spy cam watch for kids, haha.
customer_reviews.text: My six year old likes it a lot, but all it does is record & take short video clips. He’s like a little spy, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Jane

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Kids don't need this and will get over it after one day.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie G

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son (4) loves this but we get frustrated because it resets the time whenever it turns off or runs out of battery. It's just a lot of extra work. Also, he loves to set the alarm so we just need to be careful to put it on the charger for bedtime so he doesn't wake himself up. Charge seems to last a day or a day and a half or thereabouts.
customer_reviews.author: Do-It-Yourself Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice even for 3y
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and my 3 year kid can deal with it with a little help. But unfortunately one star missing because I'm as a parent can control only how much per day my kid can use and play with it. But the unlock of parent guardian can be done easily starting from age 6 because the lock is instructing you to "press green button times " "press yellow four times"... Etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after getting a little wet
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! My eight year old son loved it but the screen went blank and it stopped working after getting a drop wet. Very dissapointing I was under the impression it was waterproof or we would've been more careful.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my 6 year old son. Loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6 year old son. Loves it. Gives him something to do in the car. Helps him with telling the time. Lots of games and learning games.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: it was awesome. But I got a few drops of water ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it for about 5 hours. it was awesome. But I got a few drops of water on it, and its DEAD forever. this is horrible. I HATE IT. But if this happens to you, put it in dry rice overnight, then charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 7

customer_reviews.title: Bought watch for 5 year old and the band broke ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought watch for 5 year old and the band broke on the 1st day. This watch is not kid proof.
customer_reviews.author: Kent L.

customer_reviews.title: Better for older children
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost four and enjoys playing with the camera and changing the clock face, but it would be more suited for an older child. It's not easy for me to figure out, and I'm not ignorant to technology. Product is sturdy and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Akaisaru7

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality product. Just as pictured and this vendor was really great at getting it to us fast without additional postage.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy F.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new smart watch. Great watch for teaching kids how to tell time.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not last
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except battery is used up in 5 to 10 min after a full charge. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Amulets

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My kids love having this smart watch. It has been charged once and still has battery left in it after one month.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this watch. Its so easy for them to use and play with. The color is also great. Its just a little bulky, but if your kids don't where it all day, it should be fine. I have not had it long enough to need to download photo/videos, so I cannot comment on ease of syncing to your computer.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMama14

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute smart watch for a child. A little hard to use for a 3 and a half year old to understand but practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Cassiusgma

customer_reviews.title: Kid-Safe for sure!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this smartwatch for my son for his 6th birthday. My son is really rough with things and intentionally tries to break toys, so I was reluctant to give this to him, but I did. He has had it now for 2 months and it is still working awesome! No complaints. This holds up to the "kid test" in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Texas AmazonBun

customer_reviews.title: Seven year old grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: He had no trouble learning how to use it. He spent the first few hours after he got it playing with it with his older brother. It was his favorite birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: C. Muir

customer_reviews.title: they both LOVE IT! They agree it was the best present ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6 and 3 year old kids for christmas, they both LOVE IT! They agree it was the best present Santa gave them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a gift and he loves his first smartwatch. It tells time, tracks steps, takes pictures/videos and has age appropriate games on it. He's very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Super Momma

customer_reviews.title: Nothing visable on screen after two days.
customer_reviews.text: Six year old son enjoyed this watch very much until the screen turned completely white not allowing anything to be displayed. Only two days out of box and now a piece of junk with only sound effects. My son has been extremely careful with this item. Frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift for a smaller child.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 year old. Kept her busy for a little while. Cant do too much even after downloading the rest of the games they offer. I'd say buy this for ages 4-6
customer_reviews.author: jessica cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Not happy:( waste of $$..JUNK!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these.. Wasn't satisfied. Screen keeps showing last screen under top screen..junk!!
customer_reviews.author: trina darbey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and full of features

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my grandson. Very disappointed! I followed the instructions step by step. The VTech sound is the only thing that was working. The screen display did not work at all. Returning it! Grandson😰

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

product_meta.title: VTech Kidizoom Smartwatch DX - Royal Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Royal BlueThe VTech Kidizoom Smartwatch DX is an even smarter watch for kids with more fun games and activities! Perfect for young photographers, this durable smartwatch has more memory so kids can take tons of pictures and videos. Kids will love using the new motion sensor to explore three action challenges! The Smartwatch DX also includes eight games kids can play using the touch screen as well as the ability to download more from Learning Lodge. The watch helps teach kids how to tell time by letting them choose between more than fifty 3D digital and analog displays. In addition to the alarm, timer and stopwatch, two new tools include a calendar feature and a calculator so your child can work out simple addition, subtraction, multiplication and division problems. Using the included micro USB cable your child can also upload photos and videos as well as recharge the battery. More than just a watch, it’s the Kidizoom Smartwatch DX. Features rechargeable Lithium Ion battery. Intended for ages 4 to 9 years.

BRAND STORY
By VTech
feature_bullets: The VTech Kidizoom Smartwatch DX is an even smarter kids watch with more fun games and activities; interactive kids watches feature 3 fun activities, 5 games, 3 action challenges and a motion sensor

In addition to the alarm, timer and stopwatch, the VTech watch has 2 new tools including a calendar feature and a calculator so your child can work out simple addition, subtraction, multiplication and division problems
Digital and analog kids smartwatch display comes with 50 plus clock face designs; splash proof for everyday play (splash and sweat proof; do not submerge and not suitable for showering or bathing)
More than just a watch, it's the VTech Kidizoom Smartwatch DX; features rechargeable Lithium Ion battery and includes micro USB cable to upload photos/videos as well as recharge the battery

Kids watches are perfect for young photographers, this durable smartwatch has more memory so kids can take tons of pictures and videos; feature camera with photo effects, video camera, voice recorder with voice-changing effects and touch screen. Best for ages: 4 to 9 years
